description:

Its leak-proof multi-layer design ensures confidence and freshness throughout the day. The free size fit comfortably adjusts to Medium and Large body types, offering a snug yet gentle hold.

Perfect for daily use, overnight wear, or travel, this panty combines comfort, durability, and style ? keeping you confident every day of the month.
